skins.shipDescription: Omaha-class light cruiser ¨C Marblehead, Hull Number CL-12.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Marblehead, your average Omaha-class girl. I went like, all over the globe during the war, and stuff like that. Anyhoo, let's be buds and just chill, 'kay?
skins.acquisition: Sup. Name's Marblehead. Are you the Commander? Ahah¡î I dig your style. Hehehe, let's hang out sometime!
skins.login: Libra's horoscope for today promises... super good luck.
skins.details: Why follow the stupidly serial boss-and-subordinate template, am I right? Hehehe, let's just hang out and be friends!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Yo, Commander, I promised Memphis I'd color her nails in 2 hours! That's gonna take about an hour to do, so if you've got work for me then you might wanna give it now.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Let's see... Hey, Commander~ See this? I don't really get what this part says, but somethin' about it looks off.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Put the seal there, check the numbers, make a report... Hm? Oh, I'm not up to anything special! You're just imagining things, probably!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I'm trying to take a selfie here, so could you move?

skins.shipDescription: After trying out a whole bunch of activities, I settled on joinin' the boxing club in the end. Everyone wants to exercise now and then, right? Come along, Commander, and we'll have a fun workout together~
skins.acquisition: After trying out a whole bunch of activities, I settled on joinin' the boxing club in the end. Everyone wants to exercise now and then, right? Come along, Commander, and we'll have a fun workout together~
skins.login: All right, Commander, let's start with some warmups~
skins.details: I started reading up on building muscle for future reference, and man there's a lot to learn~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let's leave our boring work and social troubles behind and focus only on workin' out~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I need a break... All right, time to check out the MME tournament on TV~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you seen Omaha 'round here? I bet she's off gorging herself on snacks in secret. Don't let her get away with it~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Sooo, Commander, when we're working out... who're your eyes on~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Using the fat around your chest for softening impacts... kinda actually works?!

skins.shipDescription: Whoa! Talk about a stunning view! You like, totally all the best spots in the city, Commander~ Hehe, okay, so... Merry Christmas!
skins.acquisition: Whoa! Talk about a stunning view! You like, totally know all the best spots in the city, Commander~ Hehe, okay, so... Merry Christmas!
skins.login: Hey Commander, you ready to get? "To get what"? To get to work, man! Hehehe~
skins.details: Hmm... The snow's falling at a rate of 3cm per second, so assuming no wind, tomorrow's forecast should be something like... Oh, Commander? Just talkin' to myself!
skins.secretaryIdle1: You think Santa Claus is real, Commander? Me, I think he's like, basically real. Because, y'know, there's all these people wearing legit Santa costumes in stores and stuff. Hahaha.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If Miss Raleigh were in my shoes here, she'd totes be blushing to her ears.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wanna draw something with me, Commander? Y'know, like, exhaling on the window and making shapes with your finger~
skins.secretaryTouch: Feeling chilly? You can come closer if you wanna~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Winter makes you wanna snuggle up, doesn't it~?
